column5: Was able to get out with two buddies in Tay township for a sunday gun hunt (only township around that's allowed). The other two set up at the bottom of the field and I set up on the top end, about 300 yards away from them. They had 4 birds walk directly behind them, totally ignored their decoys and they didn't even see them until it was too late. I saw the birds and they just started walking my way. It felt like an eternity, but leaning against the tree, I watched them about about 20 yards away...two hens...a jake...and a TOM! YEE HAW....slowly lifted the REM and bang. Nice bird.......with a really big fan.  Done for the year, might go out a couple of times to call and video tape for some guys...time to get my boat ready!
Man... I shore wish one of you "great white hunters" could actually tag one of our smart birds here in the yard.....
Thats a fine looking Tom there MARTY.CONGRATS BUD.  I finaly get to go out this coming friday.Local has told me, theres a big tom out every morning.
I don't hunt but never knew there was 3 diff sex of these birds.  Male, female and IT.  Huh, who knew?

It is possible to have a hen (female)with a beard,which is legal to shoot.You can not take a hen in the spring(without abeard),but can in the fall hunt.Then theres the jake,a yound male ,which you can shoot.The big tom is the prize hunt.
Wow, I didn't know hunting was about looking for the odd bearded lady!
BTW, thanks Brian.  I didn't know, no joke...
very nice tom you got there.  i went this evening, but my buddy busted one on his way to me, 11 inch beard and 1 1/4 spurs. i know he would have been mine had he not been there.  jason
Awesome tom Marty Now go get some fishies will ya Leechman
There's a few in that area, unless this map is wrong..  You just have to drive for a 1/2 hour or so.  Dam nice bird man.  Good job!  http://www.ofah.org/hunting/index.cfm?ID=33
Thanks, I know that, that's why I wrote the only township around....ME!! LOL...
Awesome bird dude! I've though about getting into hunting, just too expensive for me right now.
Isee that 76C,where I hunt is closed to sunday hunting,yet I heard them blasting down at the river while I was in my stand last fall.Dont give me the target shooting crapola.
Them birds sure are smart Marty.. well at least ours are anyhow !! You pulled your camera and blind last night.. and 4 Toms walked down the runway at 9am this morning...
Too funny!  Thanks for all the replies guys!  Looking forward to fall now!!
I'll come kill them all if you want....  Nice Boid Martin.
